p: Height (terminal bud to collar) and root collar diameter measurements were made within 24 to 48 h of harvesting. Once the measurements were completed, each seedling was cut off at the root collar and the shoot (above ground) and root system were placed in separate paper bags and oven-dried for a minimum of 48h at 65Â°C. Then the shoot and root dry mass were determined for each of the 200 seedlings sampled.
